subjectDescription: Discover a full suite of online business courses that will allow you to make better business decisions and succeed in today's competitive business world. Our courses provide a rich learning experience that will allow you to develop critical business skills in areas such as business... Read more...
title: How to Build a Profitable Small Business Brand
headline: In this free online advanced branding course, learn the vital strategies and tools to scale up your small business.
description: Do you want to learn how to build a profitable brand? This course will teach you how to position your brand boldly to attract high-paying premium customers. Learn how to differentiate your brand in the marketplace and stand out from the competition. In addition, you will learn how to present your brand attractively to the customer visually, work with social media influencers and become a well-recognized and powerful brand.
courseDescription:
In this advanced branding course for small businesses, you will learn how to become a powerful branding manager and marketer. Study the tactics, strategies and little secrets that go on behind closed doors for highly successful small business brands that generate hundreds of millions in sales. You will kick-start this course by setting up the right foundations and position your brand powerfully and correctly to attract premium customers. See how to leverage the 4Ps of marketing - products, price, promotion and placement - to position your brand in the marketplace and differentiate it from other commodity businesses that only compete on price and low margins. This first step will not only bring you so much more money, but will also elevate your offering to a legitimate, unique and powerful brand that serves a specific group of profitable customers and no one else.

The second part will walk you through a thorough analysis of brand style, themes, personality, visual photography and identity. You will learn through examples and case studies how to design a bold and unique logo, how to take desirable and cohesive product photographs, and how to design and optimize your website and Amazon store both for attractiveness and sales conversions. You will further see how to present your brand photography beautifully on social media and how to create personalized and eye-grabbing packaging design that grabs customers by the heart and gives them no choice but to buy your product. The course will also go through examples from the top leading massive brands such as Nike, Apple, Lego, Coca-cola and more and teach you the power of archetypes. Understand how to leverage them to adopt a unique personality that matches your customersâ€™ unique style and makes them join your brand, fall in love with it and buy more products. Go through a step-by-step process of how you can scale up your brand marketing and promotions by working with influencers and paid advertising besides partnering up with other media creators to drive move awareness, authority and trust toward your brand.

You will also learn how to scale and widen your distribution, which means you will sell your products to more customers in more places, be it locally, nationally and internationally. Master how to work both with retail consumers and distributors, or retailers and make your brand widely recognized on a national or global level. Understand how you can scale your product line to more items that you can up-sell, cross-sell to existing customers or create new low-entry offers that attract new customers to your brand later on to sell them more expensive items which, in return, will make you more money. At the end of the course, you will go through a detailed step-by-step case-study of a $198-million brand and teach you how you mirror their strategy to your benefit. This course puts you on the right track for building a successful business. If you are looking to become a powerful and strategic entrepreneur, or branding and marketing manager, then this course is going to be your ultimate guide to profitable and scalable business branding.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our pricing, please visit our Pricing Page
slides:
• Learning Outcomes

  • Having completed this module, you will be able to:
    • Distinguish your brand powerfully in the market price and attract premium customers.
    • Distinguish your brand from the competition and stand out in the marketplace.
    • Outline your brand's visual elements, including social media lifestyle images, product website images, logo, and packaging design boldly and attractively.
    • Analyze and optimize your brand website and Amazon store for attractiveness and sales.
    • Define your brand with a unique and desirable personality that attracts a specific group of customers with a specific mindset and interests.
    • Identify social media influencers and media publishers to scale your brand marketing and become recognized as a premium brand.
    • Analyze your brand product line and become an authority and lifestyle brand, acquire new customers and generate more profit. 
    • Analyze your brand distribution online and offline, sell to more customers locally, nationally, or internationally, and become a powerful brand.
